channel.title: [Release]God shields ints included[release]
channel.description:
Well here are my god shields still working on sarradomin ill update when i finish. Here's what they look like [IMG]http://i275.photobucket.com/albums/jj297/scootydd/godshields.jpg[/img] Iv never coded anything before tbh so these ints might not be right tell me if they are Bandos
if(i == 12058) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 12058 1) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12058; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12057; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12057; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bandos god shield"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A shield once used by Bandos himself".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
Armadyl
if(i == 12059) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 12059 1) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12060; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12059; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12059; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Armadyl god shield"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A wonderous shield once used by Armadyl himself".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
Zamorak
if(i == 12061) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 12061 1) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12062; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12061; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12061; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Zamorak god shield"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "An evil shield once used by Zamorak himself".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
You can download it here [url=http://uppit.com/v/YJ2GURD6]http://uppit.com/v/YJ2GURD6[/url] I havnt got a server so if you use them post an in game piccy please. Thanks I hope you like my work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 11:33:53 am[/size][hr]If these dont work im going to release as a Metasequoia file for you to animate because im a noob tbh.

item.title: [Release]God shields ints included[release]

item.description:
@mironic wrote:

lol … FIX YOUR BOX HILT!!! XD… im only telling you yo fix it XD… dont get mad… lol when my hilys are crappy ACF yells at me untill i fix them :3 so does silent… and dillan so im yelling at you to fix it XD

item.title: [Release]God shields ints included[release]
item.dc:creator: @Pigrear Pigrear
item.description:
@Pigrear wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:23, topic:296666”][quote author=Pigrear link=topic=392650.msg3036839#msg3036839 date=1258831467]
The faces are a little rough, but otherwise good job. 6/10
[/quote]
just like oyur handle is a bit BOX… LOT A BOX… your handle is one big box… and you call his shields… rough XD… there godshields wich means they were used in alot of godwars so they should be a lil roughed up… anyway… befor you crit on how other poeple modela nd you cant model a simple round hilt FIX YOUR HILT!!! befor you crit on people far who surpass you

  • toy mironic[/quote]
    This was very unnecessary. I made it a box, becasue i thought it was supposed to be a box… Dick.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release]God shields ints included[release]
item.dc:creator: @scootydd scootydd
item.description:
@scootydd wrote:

Well here are my god shields still working on sarradomin ill update when i finish.
Here’s what they look like

godshields.jpg1023×566

Iv never coded anything before tbh so these ints might not be right tell me if they are
Bandos

if(i == 12058) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 12058 1) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12058; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12057; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12057; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Bandos god shield"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A shield once used by Bandos himself".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
Armadyl
if(i == 12059) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 12059 1) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12060; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12059; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12059; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Armadyl god shield"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A wonderous shield once used by Armadyl himself".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
Zamorak
if(i == 12061) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup 12061 1) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12062; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12061; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12061; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Zamorak god shield"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "An evil shield once used by Zamorak himself".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

You can download it here http://uppit.com/v/YJ2GURD6

I havnt got a server so if you use them post an in game piccy please.
Thanks I hope you like my work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 11:33:53 am[/size][hr]If these dont work im going to release as a Metasequoia file for you to animate because im a noob tbh.
